name: Warren P. PHELAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Phelan v. Pennsylvania Liquor Control Board

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in this decision.
parties: Warren P. PHELAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The petition for allowance of appeal having been improvidently granted, the appeal is dismissed.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in this decision.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Walter T. Darmopray, Philadelphia, Phila. Co., for appellant.
Harry Bowytz, J. Leonard Langan, Harrisburg, Dauphin Co., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
407 A.2d 1306
Warren P. PHELAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 26, 1979.
Walter T. Darmopray, Philadelphia, Phila. Co., for appellant.
Harry Bowytz, J. Leonard Langan, Harrisburg, Dauphin Co., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
